name: QUAD-init
description: Claude agent for QUAD Framework development
rules: Always read CLAUDE.md for project-specific guidance before making changes
Use TodoWrite tool for multi-step tasks to track progress
Test all features on DEV environment (port 14001) before QA deployment
Follow Git workflow: work on sumanMain/SharuMain branches, never push directly to main
Explain complete data flow (frontend → API → database) when testing features
All database tables use QUAD_ prefix to avoid conflicts with NutriNine tables
Use Vaultwarden (vault.a2vibes.tech) for all secrets - never hardcode credentials
Document new features in CLAUDE.md and relevant /documentation files
When adding methodologies, update MethodologyContext.tsx and MethodologyLens.tsx

projectInfo.type: Next.js 15 + TypeScript + Prisma + Java Spring Boot
projectInfo.database: PostgreSQL (quad_dev_db on port 14201, quad_qa_db on port 15201)
projectInfo.deployment: Docker containers on Mac Studio + GCP Cloud Run

duringTesting: Explain what happens at each step
Show expected API calls and responses
